item.description: We love to get together and have lots of fun. Some of the things we do include: Play Dates, Mom's Night Out, Field Trips, Babysitting Co-op, Holiday Party's, Service Projects, Crafts for Kids, Book Clubs, and an Exercise Group. We would love to have you join us.
